map.Model
Class Room

java.lang.Object
  map.Model.Room
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Room
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

This class defines the rooms that can be connected by connections and be added in a map in Game Engine. This class uses composite pattern to describe the relationships between each rooms in a map.

Version:
1.31
Author:
Pei Yu
See Also:
Serialized Form
